content.description: Sit start with jug and the tree to your left and follow the arete to top out.
content.location:
Sit start with jug and the tree to your left and follow the arete to top out.

2nd boulder of the field on the left side of the road (North Side). There should be one of the first pull off you see on the left. Look up the hill on your right. You will see the climb from the road. This area is before The Dice Area. If you park at the Dice area walk back towards the church. If you cross a river you are on the wrong side of the hollow

content.description: Start on the jug by the tree and go left toward the left side of the boulder. Top out following the jugs
content.protection: 2 Pads and spotter for the tree
content.location:
The problem by the tree

Second Boulder of the field on the left side of the road (North Side). There should be one of the first pull off you see on the left. Look up the hill on your right. You will see the climb from the road. This area is before The Dice Area. If you park at the Dice area walk back towards the church.

content.description: Same start as Lay Me Down but go right and top out just left of the tree.
content.location: Second Boulder of the field on the left side of the road (North Side). There should be one of the first pull off you see on the left. Look up the hill on your right. You will see the climb from the road. This area is before The Dice Area. If you park at the Dice area walk back towards the church.

content.description:
This is the first line on going right on this boulder. The start is on the jug just under the mini roof. Go straight up and pull though the hard side pull crux.

Top out

Two is best to protect this climb
content.location:
Second Boulder of the field on the left side of the road (North Side). There should be one of the first pull off you see on the left. Look up the hill on your right. You will see the climb from the road. This area is before The Dice Area. If you park at the Dice area walk back towards the church.

There is a bunch of moderates that are classic with easy walk offs. Wonderful area to warm up.

content.description: Just right of Warm Me up. Sit start and go straight up using the edges to get the top and top out
content.location: 2nd boulder of the field on the left side of the road (North Side). There should be one of the first pull off you see on the left. Look up the hill on your right. You will see the climb from the road. This area is before The Dice Area. If you park at the Dice area walk back towards the church. If you cross a river you are on the wrong side of the hollow
